titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6052) to promote increased public transportation use, to promote increased use of alternative fuels in providing public transportation, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-734, by Ms. Castor.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order at any time on the legislative day of Thursday, June 26, 2008, for the Speaker entertain specified motions to suspend the rules.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 244.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1304.
DEBATE - The House continued with further debate on H. Res. 1304.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 198 (Roll no. 462).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 196 (Roll no. 463).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/25/2008--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6052) to promote increased public transportation use, to promote increased use of alternative fuels in providing public transportation.
